name: ipfs-pubsub-chat-example
description: A ~76KB example chat app that uses window.ipfs, provided by the IPFS Companion web extension

scripts.build:copy:html: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:copy:ipfs-css:css: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp node_modules/ipfs-css/ipfs.css dist
scripts.build:copy:ipfs-css:fonts: shx mkdir -p dist/fonts && shx cp node_modules/ipfs-css/fonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.build:copy:tachyons: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp node_modules/tachyons/css/tachyons.css dist

author: Alan Shaw
